channel.title: Icon tools
channel.description: Clean icons of undesired layers, texts and useless groups. Prepare them for a clean export without tints and masks (for those using the tint hack).

item.title: Version 1.0.8
item.description: • Fixes a bug that was causing to crash and not complete full list of icons.

item.title: Version 1.0.7
item.description: • Added plugin logo and a more accurate description.

item.title: Version 1.0.6
item.description: • Added option to choose between selected items, or the whole current page.

item.title: Version 1.0.5
item.description: • Added option to choose between selected items, or the whole current page.

item.title: Version 1.0.3
item.description: • Sketch.app plugin to clean icons and to prepare them for a clean export without tints and masks.
